item.title: Smart Nutrient Sensor Prototype (SNS-L) Successfully Developed
item.description:
ðŸŒ± Smart Nutrient Sensor Prototype (SNS-L) Successfully Developed

We are excited to announce the completion of AgrAInno’s first Smart Nutrient Sensor prototype, SNS-L, a major step toward real-time, AI-powered nutrient monitoring for precision agriculture.

item.title: AgriWeed App Now Available on iOS
item.description:
ðŸŒ¿ AgriWeed App Now Available on iOS!

We are excited to announce that AgriWeed, our AI-powered smartphone app for fast and accurate weed identification, is now officially available on the Apple iOS Store.

item.title: AgrAInno: Agriculture, AI, Innovation
item.description:
Vision

A future where agriculture is intelligent, sustainable, and resource-efficient through AI and sensing technologies.
